text: The Great Lover is a 1920 American silent drama film directed by Frank Lloyd and starring John St. Polis, Richard Tucker and Claire Adams.Goble p.785 ==Cast== * John St. Polis as Jean Paurel * Richard Tucker as Ward * Claire Adams as Ethel * John Davidson as Sonino * Alice Hollister as Bianca * Lionel Belmore as Impresario * Rose Dione as Sabotini * Tom Ricketts as Potter * Frederick Vroom as Doctor * Gino Corrado as Secretary ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1920 films Category:1920 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Frank Lloyd Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Goldwyn Pictures films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Great Lover (1920 film)
